sentences: Ahvilised on seltsloomade alamseltsi kuuluvad loomad.
Inimene ja ahvid on ühte perekonda kuuluvad liikmed.
context: The word 'kuuluvad' is the 3rd person plural present tense form of the Estonian verb 'kuuluma', which means 'to belong to' or 'to be a member of'. It indicates that something belongs to a particular group, category, or classification. In this context from the zoological definition, it shows that certain animals (primates) are members of the suborder of primates.
